response.overview: The classic film "On the Surface" features a host of disciplines including Motocross, Speedway, Grass Track Racing, Trials, Sand racing and Bike GP racing. The featured events are the Motocross De Natione - speedway racing; Chilton Hill grass track racing at Stokenchurch; the Red Rose trials at the North Western Centre for the ACU, sand racing at Pendine, a demonstration of driving on wet road surfaces, Essex Police Advance Driving School at the Chelmsford Skid Pad and the Austrian Grand Prix.
response.title: On the Surface
